name: worms-ii
description: Worms II in your browser. Not affiliated with Team 17.

scripts.prestart: npm run clean && tsc && tsc -p client
scripts.watch: concurrently -n "TS server,TS client, nodemon " -c cyanBright,blueBright,magentaBright -p name "tsc -w" "tsc -p client -w" "nodemon"
scripts.serve: npm run prestart && npm run watch

author: P.U. Turtle
